document.full_text: a new jersey judge on tuesday said the state's school budget cuts fail to meet constitutional standards for education, dealing a political blow to republican gov. chris christie who has slashed education spending by more than $800 million.
document.title: judge's study finds new jersey budget cuts fail schools
lines_and_colors: a new jersey judge on tuesday said the state's school budget cuts fail to meet constitutional standards for education, dealing a political blow to republican gov. chris christie who has slashed education spending by more than $800 million.
